entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 04:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NNE 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 1 except zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this morning then to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High minus 1 except zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain mixed with freezing rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
